author: Staff Reporter
text:
A special flying squad seized saris worth Rs. 1 lakh during a vehicle check on Dindigul-Karur Road near Chennamanaickanpatti near here on Friday.

The officials intercepted a mini lorry going to Vedasandur, in which they found three bundles of saris.

The lorry driver told them that he was transporting the goods to Vedasandur. But he did not have any valid document for transporting the saris. The officials seized the sari bundles and kept them at Dindigul West taluk office.
title: Saris worth Rs. 1 lakh seized near Dindigul
